name: Spirit Guide Crucible
description: Enter the Crucible, a walled-in arena where you fight face-hugging spiders and blood-sucking worms, terrifying mechanised golems, bomb carrying grunts, and the ever present Summoners, which must be destroyed before the stream of enemies can be turned off and you can progressâ€¦and finally escape!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Storage: 380 MB available space Additional Notes: The minimum and recommended specs match those of the Oculus Rift.
